ns2:application.ns2:doc: This is the reference section of the FishEye REST API.
For information about FishEye Plugin Development, visit the Development Hub.
This documentation was automatically generated from the WADL.

ns2:resource.ns2:doc: Provides an API to get a list of changesets from a repository.

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc: List of changesets from a repository.

ns2:param.name: rep
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository

ns2:param.name: path
ns2:param.ns2:doc: repository path

ns2:param.name: committer
ns2:param.ns2:doc: ID of the committer

ns2:param.name: comment
ns2:param.ns2:doc: comment to match

ns2:param.name: p4JobFixed
ns2:param.ns2:doc: Perforce option to select the changesets marked as fixing

ns2:param.name: expand
ns2:param.ns2:doc: expand query parameter to specify the maximum number of results

ns2:param.name: beforeCsid
ns2:param.ns2:doc: parent of the changesets

ns2:response.ns2:doc: list of changesets matching the criteria

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <results> <changesets> <changeset> <repositoryName>repo1</repositoryName> <csid>csid1</csid> <date>2017-11-27T14:12:31.231Z</date> <author>author1</author> <branch>branch1</branch> <comment>merge</comment> <p4JobIds>p4job1</p4JobIds> <p4JobIds>p4job2</p4JobIds> <revisions size="1"> <revision totalLines="10" fileRevisionState="ADDED" rev="rev123456" path="/path/to/file.txt" linesRemoved="2" linesAdded="2" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.230Z" csid="csid" contentLink="contentLink" author="author1"> <ancestor>ancestor1</ancestor> <ancestor>ancestor2</ancestor> <comment>merged</comment> </revision> </revisions> <reviews size="1"> <review> <metricsVersion>0</metricsVersion> <permaId/> </review> </reviews> </changeset> </changesets> </results>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: list of changesets matching the criteria

ns2:response.ns2:doc: list of changesets matching the criteria

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: list of changesets matching the criteria

ns2:resource.ns2:doc: Provides an API to list information about the repositories.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list of all the repositories

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <repositoryList> <repository repositoryState="RUNNING" name="svn-repo" finishedFullSlurp="true" enabled="true" displayName="svn-repo-renamed"/> <repository repositoryState="STOPPED" name="hg-repo" finishedFullSlurp="true" enabled="false" displayName="hg-repo"/> </repositoryList>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample list of repositories registered to a FishEye instance.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list of all the repositories

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample list of repositories registered to a FishEye instance.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Get the information about a repository.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: information about the repository

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <repository repositoryState="RUNNING" name="svn-repo" finishedFullSlurp="true" enabled="true" displayName="svn-repo-renamed"> <path>project</path> <url>com.sample.project</url> </repository>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample information about a repository.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: information about the repository

ns3:pre.ns3:code: { "name" : "svn-repo", "displayName" : "svn-repo-renamed", "enabled" : true, "finishedFullSlurp" : true, "url" : "com.sample.project", "path" : "project", "repositoryState" : "RUNNING" }

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample information about a repository.

ns2:resource.ns2:doc: Provides an API for getting information about changesets and filerevisions indexed by fisheye.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository to query.

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Get a list of the file revisions for a specific path.

ns2:param.name: path
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the path to query.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list of the filerevisions of this path.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <fileRevisionList> <fileRevision totalLines="30" fileRevisionState="ADDED" rev="1" path="trunk/readme.txt" linesRemoved="0" linesAdded="30" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.329Z" csid="MAIN:peter:2010000" contentLink="" author="peter"> <comment>added readme</comment> </fileRevision> <fileRevision totalLines="42" fileRevisionState="CHANGED" rev="2" path="trunk/readme.txt" linesRemoved="0" linesAdded="12" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.329Z" csid="MAIN:douglas:2010042" contentLink="" author="douglas"> <ancestor>1</ancestor> <comment>first revision</comment> </fileRevision> <fileRevision totalLines="451" fileRevisionState="CHANGED" rev="3" path="trunk/readme.txt" linesRemoved="0" linesAdded="409" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.329Z" csid="MAIN:ray:2010451" contentLink="" author="ray"> <ancestor>2</ancestor> <comment>second revision</comment> </fileRevision> </fileRevisionList>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of the filerevisions of a path.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list of the filerevisions of this path.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: { "fileRevision" : [ { "path" : "trunk/readme.txt", "rev" : "1", "author" : "peter", "date" : 1511791951329, "totalLines" : 30, "linesAdded" : 30, "linesRemoved" : 0, "csid" : "MAIN:peter:2010000", "comment" : "added readme", "contentLink" : "", "ancestor" : [ ], "fileRevisionState" : "ADDED" }, { "path" : "trunk/readme.txt", "rev" : "2", "author" : "douglas", "date" : 1511791951329, "totalLines" : 42, "linesAdded" : 12, "linesRemoved" : 0, "csid" : "MAIN:douglas:2010042", "comment" : "first revision", "contentLink" : "", "ancestor" : [ "1" ], "fileRevisionState" : "CHANGED" }, { "path" : "trunk/readme.txt", "rev" : "3", "author" : "ray", "date" : 1511791951329, "totalLines" : 451, "linesAdded" : 409, "linesRemoved" : 0, "csid" : "MAIN:ray:2010451", "comment" : "second revision", "contentLink" : "", "ancestor" : [ "2" ], "fileRevisionState" : "CHANGED" } ] }

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of the filerevisions of a path.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository to query.

ns2:param.name: path
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the path of the filerevision, with respect to the fisheye repository root.

ns2:param.name: revision
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the id of the filerevision to retrieve.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list of tags associated with this revision.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <tagList> <tag>TAG1</tag> <tag>TAG2</tag> <tag>TAG3</tag> </tagList>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of tags associated with this revision.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list of tags associated with this revision.

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of tags associated with this revision.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository to query.

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Get a list of information about files and directories in a path.

ns2:param.name: path
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the path to query, with respect to the fisheye repository root.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list information about files and directories in the path.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <pathList> <pathInfo name="branches" headDeleted="false" dir="true"/> <pathInfo name="tags" headDeleted="false" dir="true"/> <pathInfo name="trunk" headDeleted="false" dir="true"/> </pathList>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of information about files and directories in the path.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a list information about files and directories in the path.

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of information about files and directories in the path.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository to query.

ns2:param.name: path
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the path of the filerevision, with respect to the fisheye repository root.

ns2:param.name: revision
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the id of the filerevision to retrieve.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: infomation about the specified filerevision.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <fileRevision totalLines="451" fileRevisionState="CHANGED" rev="3" path="trunk/readme.txt" linesRemoved="0" linesAdded="409" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.329Z" csid="MAIN:ray:2010451" contentLink="" author="ray"> <ancestor>2</ancestor> <comment>second revision</comment> </fileRevision>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Information about the specified filerevision.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: infomation about the specified filerevision.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: { "path" : "trunk/readme.txt", "rev" : "3", "author" : "ray", "date" : 1511791951329, "totalLines" : 451, "linesAdded" : 409, "linesRemoved" : 0, "csid" : "MAIN:ray:2010451", "comment" : "second revision", "contentLink" : "", "ancestor" : [ "2" ], "fileRevisionState" : "CHANGED" }

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Information about the specified filerevision.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository to query.

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Get a list of changesets on a repository.

ns2:param.name: path
ns2:param.ns2:doc: restrict the changesets to those in this path, should be "/" to look at the whole repository.

ns2:param.name: start
ns2:param.ns2:doc: only return changesets after this date.

ns2:param.name: end
ns2:param.ns2:doc: only return changesets before this date.

ns2:param.name: maxReturn
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the maximum number of changesets to return.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: the list of changeset ids, and the value of maxReturn (the limit to the number of changesets to return).

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <changesetIdList resultsTruncated="false"> <csid>MAIN:peter:20100101000000</csid> <csid>MAIN:douglas:20100101000042</csid> <csid>MAIN:ray:20100101000451</csid> </changesetIdList>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of changesets on a repository.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: the list of changeset ids, and the value of maxReturn (the limit to the number of changesets to return).

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: A list of changesets on a repository.

ns2:param.name: csid
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the ChangesetID of the changeset to return.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository to query.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: the changeset specified by csid.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <changeset repositoryName="repositoryName" position="0" displayId="changeset_display_id" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.330Z" csid="changeset_id" branch="branch" author="author"> <branches> <branch>branch</branch> </branches> <children> <child>child2</child> <child>child1</child> </children> <comment>comment</comment> <fileRevisionKey rev="revision_id" path="dir/path/path/"/> <fileRevisionKey rev="revision_id_2" path="dir2/path2/path2/"/> <p4JobIds> <p4JobId>job1</p4JobId> <p4JobId>job2</p4JobId> <p4JobId>job3</p4JobId> </p4JobIds> <parents> <parent>parent</parent> </parents> <tags> <tag>tag1</tag> <tag>tag2</tag> </tags> </changeset>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: The changeset specified by csid.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: the changeset specified by csid.

ns3:pre.ns3:code: { "repositoryName" : "repositoryName", "csid" : "changeset_id", "displayId" : "changeset_display_id", "position" : "0", "parents" : [ "parent" ], "children" : [ "child2", "child1" ], "date" : 1511791951330, "author" : "author", "branches" : [ "branch" ], "tags" : [ "tag1", "tag2" ], "comment" : "comment", "p4JobIds" : [ "job1", "job2", "job3" ], "branch" : "branch", "fileRevisionKey" : [ { "path" : "dir/path/path/", "rev" : "revision_id" }, { "path" : "dir2/path2/path2/", "rev" : "revision_id_2" } ] }

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: The changeset specified by csid.

ns2:resource.ns2:doc: Provides an API to execute FishEye queries against a repository.

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Execute a query across repositories. By default, this will search all repositories.

ns2:param.name: query
ns2:param.ns2:doc: text to search for in commit message and p4 jobId. Must not be empty.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: restrict search to only these repositories (by their keys)

ns2:param.name: expand
ns2:param.ns2:doc: expand query parameter to specify the maximum number of results. Format is changesets[n:m].revisions[n:m],reviews the default number of changesets returned is 30, the maximum returned is 100

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <results> <changesets> <changeset> <repositoryName>repo1</repositoryName> <csid>csid1</csid> <date>2017-11-27T14:12:31.231Z</date> <author>author1</author> <branch>branch1</branch> <comment>merge</comment> <p4JobIds>p4job1</p4JobIds> <p4JobIds>p4job2</p4JobIds> <revisions size="1"> <revision totalLines="10" fileRevisionState="ADDED" rev="rev123456" path="/path/to/file.txt" linesRemoved="2" linesAdded="2" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.230Z" csid="csid" contentLink="contentLink" author="author1"> <ancestor>ancestor1</ancestor> <ancestor>ancestor2</ancestor> <comment>merged</comment> </revision> </revisions> <reviews size="1"> <review> <metricsVersion>0</metricsVersion> <permaId/> </review> </reviews> </changeset> </changesets> </results>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample result for a FishEye cross repository query.
Sample result for a FishEye cross repository query.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc:
Execute a FishEye query (that contains a "return" statement) against a specific repository.
Note: the maximum number of results will be limited to maxReturn or 3000, whichever is the smallest number.

ns2:param.name: query
ns2:param.ns2:doc: FishEye query to execute (which must contain a "return" statement)

ns2:param.name: maxReturn
ns2:param.ns2:doc: maximum number of results (which can be left unspecified, but in that case, the maximum number of results will set to 3000 results)

ns2:response.ns2:doc: result of the query, limited to {@code maxReturn} or 3000 results, whichever is the smallest number

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <tabularQueryResult> <row> <item xsi:type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">test/readme.txt</item> <item xsi:type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">1.1</item> <item xsi:type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">peter</item> </row> <row> <item xsi:type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">test/readme.txt</item> <item xsi:type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">1.2</item> <item xsi:type="xs:string" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">peter</item> </row> <headings> <heading>path</heading> <heading>revision</heading> <heading>author</heading> </headings> </tabularQueryResult>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample result for a FishEye query such as select revisions from dir /test return path, revision, author.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: result of the query, limited to {@code maxReturn} or 3000 results, whichever is the smallest number

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample result for a FishEye query such as select revisions from dir /test return path, revision, author.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository

ns2:method.name: POST
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Retrieve a list of reviews for a changeset in a given repository.

ns2:param.name: cs
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the id of the changeset

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a serialised list of review data objects which represent the reviews for the given changeset

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <reviewsForChangeset> <reviews> <review> <allowReviewersToJoin>true</allowReviewersToJoin> <author> <avatarUrl></avatarUrl> <displayName>A. D. Ministrator</displayName> <userName>admin</userName> </author> <createDate>2017-11-27T14:12:31.219+0000</createDate> <creator> <avatarUrl></avatarUrl> <displayName>A. D. Ministrator</displayName> <userName>admin</userName> </creator> <description>Description</description> <jiraIssueKey>SAMPLE-1</jiraIssueKey> <metricsVersion>1</metricsVersion> <moderator> <avatarUrl></avatarUrl> <displayName>A. D. Ministrator</displayName> <userName>admin</userName> </moderator> <name>Sample Review</name> <permaId> <id>CR-SAMPLE-1</id> </permaId> <permaIdHistory>CR-SAMPLE-1</permaIdHistory> <projectKey>CR-SAMPLE</projectKey> <state>Review</state> <summary>Review summary</summary> <type>REVIEW</type> </review> </reviews> <changesetId>aa26d45eea2d259678b801c135cde82fe6518473</changesetId> </reviewsForChangeset>

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a serialised list of review data objects which represent the reviews for the given changeset

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository

ns2:method.name: POST
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Retrieve a list of reviews for each given changeset in a given repository.

ns2:param.name: cs
ns2:param.ns2:doc: a list of changeset ids

ns2:response.ns2:doc: a serialised list of review data objects which represent the reviews for each changeset

D. Ministrator</displayName> <userName>admin</userName> </author> <createDate>2017-11-27T14:12:31.219+0000</createDate> <creator> <avatarUrl></avatarUrl> <displayName>A. D. ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository

ns2:method.name: GET
ns2:method.ns2:doc:
Execute a FishEye query against a specific repository.
Note: the maximum number of results will be limited to maxReturn or 3000, whichever is the smallest number.

ns2:param.name: query
ns2:param.ns2:doc: FishEye query to execute

ns2:param.name: maxReturn
ns2:param.ns2:doc: maximum number of results (which can be left unspecified, but in that case, the maximum number of results will set to 3000 results)

ns2:response.ns2:doc: result of the query, limited to {@code maxReturn} or 3000 results, whichever is the smallest number

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <fileRevisionKeyList> <fileRevisionKey rev="1.1" path="test/readme.txt"/> <fileRevisionKey rev="1.2" path="test/readme.txt"/> <fileRevisionKey rev="1.3" path="test/readme.txt"/> </fileRevisionKeyList>

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample result for a FishEye query such as select revisions from dir /test.

ns2:response.ns2:doc: result of the query, limited to {@code maxReturn} or 3000 results, whichever is the smallest number

ns2:representation.ns2:doc: Sample result for a FishEye query such as select revisions from dir /test.

ns2:resource.ns2:doc: Rest service for Commit Graph data.

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository

ns2:method.name: POST
ns2:method.ns2:doc: Retrieves detailed information about a set of changesets in a repository, designed to be used with the FishEye commit graph

ns2:response.ns2:doc: detailed changeset info

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <detailedChangesets> <changesets> <changeset> <comment>merge</comment> <csid>csid1</csid> <date>30 Jul 12</date> <user> <avatarUrl>http://to/avatar</avatarUrl> <displayName>Matt Smith</displayName> <userName>matt</userName> </user> </changeset> <changeset> <comment>added functionality</comment> <csid>csid2</csid> <date>30 Jul 12</date> <user> <avatarUrl>http://to/avatar</avatarUrl> <displayName>Matt Smith</displayName> <userName>matt</userName> </user> </changeset> </changesets> </detailedChangesets>

ns2:response.ns2:doc: detailed changeset info

ns2:param.name: repository
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the key of the repository to search

ns2:param.name: branch
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the set of branches to search. If not specified, will search all branches

ns2:param.name: id
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the id of the changeset which we are

ns2:param.name: direction
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the direction to traverse. May be "before", "after" or "around"

ns2:param.name: size
ns2:param.ns2:doc: the number of changesets to return in the slice

ns2:response.ns2:doc: rest response

ns3:pre.ns3:code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <sliceData> <revisions> <revision repositoryName="repo1" position="position" displayId="dislayId1" date="2017-11-27T14:12:31.398Z" csid="csid1" branch="branch3" author="author1"> <branches> <branch>branch3</branch> <branch>branch2</branch> <branch>branch1</branch> </branches> <children> <child>child1</child> </children> <comment>comment1</comment> <fileRevisionKey rev="0001" path="/path/to/1"/> <p4JobIds> <p4JobId>p4job1</p4JobId> <p4JobId>p4job2</p4JobId> </p4JobIds> <parents> <parent>parent1</parent> </parents> <tags> <tag>tag1</tag> <tag>tag2</tag> <tag>tag3</tag> </tags> </revision> </revisions> <sparseRevisions/> </sliceData>

ns2:response.ns2:doc: rest response

ns3:pre.ns3:code: { "revisions" : [ { "repositoryName" : "repo1", "csid" : "csid1", "displayId" : "dislayId1", "position" : "position", "parents" : [ "parent1" ], "children" : [ "child1" ], "date" : 1511791951398, "author" : "author1", "branches" : [ "branch3", "branch2", "branch1" ], "tags" : [ "tag1", "tag2", "tag3" ], "comment" : "comment1", "p4JobIds" : [ "p4job1", "p4job2" ], "branch" : "branch3", "fileRevisionKey" : [ { "path" : "/path/to/1", "rev" : "0001" } ] } ], "sparseRevisions" : [ ] }
